channel.title: Making a new command and change starter?!PLEASE HELP
channel.description:
hello how do i make a ::slayer command so that ur slayer is 99?
and for all the new players i want to make that they login with 99 slayer?
can a good coder help me please:)

item.title: Making a new command and change starter?!PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @cj_own_u cj own u
item.description:
@cj_own_u wrote:

well for the first one you could do this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("slayer")) { { addSkillXp(14910000, 18);

That should, you know, work.

the big number is the xp u want to be given, and the 18 is the number of the skill stat slayer.
dunno about your second problem though, so just tell them to do ::slayer, and they should be set.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a new command and change starter?!PLEASE HELP
